alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 5:56PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Huerfano and south central Custer Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 556 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Crestone Peak, or 18 miles southwest of Junkins Burn Scar, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gardner and Red Wing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft
